description: A twelve-cylinder British grand tourer that oozes sophistication and menace in equal measure. The Royal V12 has more power than most drivers will ever use, wrapped in hand-stitched leather and polished aluminum. A gentleman's weapon.
lore: Ashworth has been building V12 grand tourers since before your grandparents were born. The Royal V12 continues that tradition with a hand-assembled engine that produces a sound like velvet thunder. It's heavy, it's expensive, and it's absolutely magnificent. The car for people who've already proven everything.
